Instruction:
Task Description: Create a Java class that implements a TCP server using Netty framework, capable of handling both secure (SSL) and non-secure connections on the same port.

Class Description: PortUnificationServer is a Netty-based TCP server that listens on a specified port and can handle both SSL and plaintext connections through port unification. It uses a boss-worker thread model for efficient connection handling.

Attributes:
PORT: int - The port number on which the server will listen for incoming connections (default: 8080)

Methods:
main: main(String[] args) -> void - The entry point of the application that:
1. Creates a self-signed SSL certificate for testing
2. Sets up Netty's event loop groups
3. Configures the server bootstrap with channel type and handlers
4. Binds to the specified port and starts the server
5. Handles graceful shutdown of resources

The method throws Exception to handle potential errors during server setup and operation.
